A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Full of plot holes . Breaks rules established in 7 movies. that's not bold\, that's lazy writing. The \"chase\" between the first order ships and the resistance had the same thrill as a race between a snail and a caterpilllar. nice visuals\, but at this point it is not enough. I don't want the screenwriters to play safe\, but c'mon guys...at least give your story a little logic.Forced humor in the critical moments\, when people are dying. really? not even funny.
